directions: Place the eggs, mustard, paprika, pepper, salt, and lemon juice into a blender. Blend on high speed until combined. Then, slowly drizzle in the oil with the blender running. Once the oil has been incorporated, scrape the mayonnaise into a bowl, and adjust the seasonings to taste. Store in the refrigerator up to 3 days.
title: Homemade Mayonnaise II
